summary: This document is an FBI electronic communication summarizing the results of a name check related to Ghislaine Maxwell in connection with Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses findings from a Miami pending inactive file, indicating accusations against Maxwell as an accomplice to Epstein in child prostitution, while noting the inability to confirm her identity with the information available.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the primary accused in connection with child prostitution allegations involving Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced as an accomplice to Jeffrey Epstein in child prostitution allegations.

persons.name: Caldwell Thadeaus
persons.context: Caldwell Thadeaus is the agent who drafted the electronic communication summarizing the name check results.

persons.name: Kimberly D. Coulter
persons.context: Kimberly D. Coulter is mentioned as the approving official for the electronic communication.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is accused of being an accomplice to Jeffrey Epstein in child prostitution activities.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was accused of child prostitution as an accomplice to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document references a pending inactive file in Miami concerning Ghislaine Craigie.
There was insufficient biographical data to confirm the identity of Ghislaine Craigie as Ghislaine Maxwell.
Caldwell Thadeaus drafted the electronic communication summarizing the name check results.
Kimberly D. Coulter approved the electronic communication.
